group_1.narration: It's true that I wanted to find Mihono,@but I was still hesitant.

group_1.textRight: It seems you've found yourselves in quite a perilous@situation.

group_1.textLeft: A situation which you also bear a fair bit of@responsibility for, I might add.

group_1.narration: It seems that due to the current situation in Kamihama,@Kyubey can't set foot inside.
But since Komachi and I commute to school,@we can meet Kyubey back in our own neighborhood.

group_1.textRight: If events proceed according to your script...
Then Mikura Komachi and Seira Mihono are likely@to perish in a murder-suicide.

group_1.textLeft: Right. So if I have to be completely honest...
I'd like to lock Komachi up somewhere safe,@right now.
I wouldn't ACTUALLY do that, of course.
Instead, I'll be partnering with Komachi for@our search.
I imagine that Komachi will keep searching for@Mihono, even if it means exposing herself to danger.
That's just the kind of person she is.
On top of that, the script dictates that "Tsukihiko"@will search for "Ruri" in a desperate panic.
And when they reunite, it'll be up to me to prevent@the tragedy that subsequently occurs.
Thus, I'll be acting alongside her at all times.

group_1.textRight: So you'll resort to force? I was under the impression@that you were more prudent than that.

group_1.textLeft: (Komachi's told me that "even though you're usually@very cautious...")
Well, to be frank, I don't think stopping them by@force will be very successful.
You ought to be much more familiar with magical@issues than we are.
